channel.title: Idea on Alex's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Idea on Alex's Notes

item.title: Inmates and communication
item.description: Background: People who are detained want to call to call home, friends or family but the prices of the phone call is prohibitive, due to corporations. Problem Statement: How might we create an application or a way for inmates to call to the outside without having to pay the high fees? Related External Links

item.title: Rapid Response Application
item.description: Problem statement: How might we better create an application where when a member of the community needs help other people are pinged Related External Links
